s.text: She has to want these as a new life, not as stopgaps while she waits for him to return.
I strongly recommend that she read a little book by Viktor E. Frankl, Man's Search for Meaning . It shows what the will to appreciate and restore life can do in the most adverse of circumstances.
Even if he returns, he is gone from her and can no longer be a part of her life.
She has to recognize that the man is gone--as gone as if a truck had hit him.
If she is determined to do that, you can help her; otherwise, you can't.
